title: Dames and Dynamite (1934) film directed by Vin Moore

sources.title: Dames and Dynamite (1934) film directed by Vin Moore
sources.description:
Three brash powder mixers - Bob Owens, Jimmie Pierson, and William "Lucky" Davis - are sent to a South American dynamite plant where their girl-chasing adventures and explosive mishaps land them in hot water with employers, police, and local women. Their romantic escapades and workplace pranks create a powder keg of comedy in the fictional country of San Rico.

Original Title: Flirting with Danger (1934) | AKA: Dames and Dynamite

Black & white version: https://youtu.be/KInrYvIVWuo
